body:
I've gone through and manually tested the front end (filters, edit recipe page, recipe history, etc) and fixed the `recipes.list` issue, as well as relevant tests (a few were using `list` when they should have been using `entries`). I also cleaned up the warnings in the console (mostly relating to changed propTypes).

npm tests pass and functionality checks out manually, though I think the Selenium tests still need updates.

edit: mildly related, finally figured out why my GPG signing wasn't working - had my commit email set to the wrong address! should be Verified moving forward

body_html:
I've gone through and manually tested the front end (filters, edit recipe page, recipe history, etc) and fixed the recipes.list issue, as well as relevant tests (a few were using list when they should have been using entries). I also cleaned up the warnings in the console (mostly relating to changed propTypes).

npm tests pass and functionality checks out manually, though I think the Selenium tests still need updates.
